keyMoments.title: Reveals Shirahoshi's Power to Brothers
keyMoments.description: Otohime explains to Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, and Manboshi that Shirahoshi is the legendary Mermaid Princess who can communicate with Sea Kings, warning them of the danger this power poses.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Otohime's understanding of the grave responsibility her daughter carries and her wisdom in preparing her sons to protect Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.quote: A Mermaid Princess of legend is capable of communicating with the Sea Kings. Shirahoshi is that princess.

keyMoments.title: Queen Otohime Assassinated
keyMoments.description: During chaos at Gyoncorde Plaza, Otohime is shot by a hidden assassin (later revealed to be Hody Jones), ending her life's work for peace.
keyMoments.significance: Otohime's death is one of the most pivotal moments in Fish-Man Island history, creating generational trauma and shaping the arc's present-day conflict.

keyMoments.title: Final Words: Do Not Hate
keyMoments.description: As she dies, Otohime pleads with her people and children not to hate the shooter or seek revenge, asking them to continue pursuing peace.
keyMoments.significance: Otohime's dying wish embodies her philosophy and prevents immediate retaliation, defining her legacy as a martyr for peace.
keyMoments.quote: No matter who the perpetrator is, you mustn't allow yourselves to be enraged for my sake. Do not hate the shooter.

keyMoments.title: Final Pinky Promise and Death
keyMoments.description: Otohime and her four children touch pinky fingers one last time before she passes away peacefully, having heard Fukaboshi's promise to continue her dream.
keyMoments.significance: The touching farewell symbolizes the unbreakable bond between Otohime and her children and their commitment to her ideals.

relationships.description: Otohime is Neptune's wife and queen of the Ryugu Kingdom.
Otohime is Shirahoshi's mother and protects her daughter's secret power.

evolutionMoments.description: Otohime reveals Shirahoshi's power to her brothers and asks them to protect her.

relationships.description: Otohime is Fukaboshi's mother. He promises to continue her dream.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi promises his dying mother to protect Shirahoshi and continue working toward peace.

reveals.information: Assassinated by Hody Jones (though not revealed until episode 552)

keyMoments.title: Power Revealed to Brothers
keyMoments.description: Otohime reveals to her sons that young Shirahoshi is the legendary Mermaid Princess capable of communicating with Sea Kings.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes why Shirahoshi must be protected and hints at her role as the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.

keyMoments.title: Marked by Vander Decken
keyMoments.description: During the chaos of her mother's assassination, Vander Decken IX touches Shirahoshi with his right hand, marking her with his Mato Mato no Mi power.
keyMoments.significance: This marking leads to Shirahoshi's ten-year imprisonment in the Hard-Shell Tower as Decken constantly sends objects toward her.

keyMoments.title: Brothers Dance to Calm Her
keyMoments.description: Nearly overwhelmed by emotion after witnessing her mother's shooting, Shirahoshi is on the verge of losing control. Her brothers Ryuboshi and Manboshi dance and sing to prevent her from crying and accidentally summoning Sea Kings.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the immediate impact of protecting Shirahoshi from emotional distress and the brothers fulfilling their vow.

keyMoments.title: Says Goodbye to Mother
keyMoments.description: Young Shirahoshi participates in the final pinky finger gesture with her mother and brothers before Otohime passes away.
keyMoments.significance: This traumatic moment, combined with being marked by Decken, shapes Shirahoshi's emotional state for the next ten years.

abilities.description: Shirahoshi can communicate with and command Sea Kings, making her the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.

relationships.description: Shirahoshi's mother who protects her secret and dies in this episode.

evolutionMoments.description: Shirahoshi witnesses her mother's assassination and says final goodbye.

relationships.description: Vander Decken marks Shirahoshi with his Devil Fruit power, beginning his obsessive pursuit.

evolutionMoments.description: Vander Decken marks Shirahoshi, allowing him to target her from anywhere.

reveals.information: Confirmed as the legendary Mermaid Princess who can communicate with Sea Kings
Marked by Vander Decken's Mato Mato no Mi

keyMoments.title: Vows to Protect Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: After learning about Shirahoshi's dangerous power from his mother, Fukaboshi pledges to become a strong warrior to protect his sister.
keyMoments.significance: This vow drives Fukaboshi's actions for the next ten years and establishes his role as protector.

keyMoments.title: Promises to Continue Mother's Dream
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi tearfully promises his dying mother that he will start over and keep her dream alive, vowing to protect Shirahoshi and work toward peace.
keyMoments.significance: Fukaboshi's promise ensures Otohime's dream doesn't die with her and drives his leadership for the next decade.
keyMoments.quote: We'll start over and keep your dream alive, so you don't have to worry. We'll protect Shirahoshi.

relationships.description: Fukaboshi's mother. He promises to continue her dream as she dies.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi makes a tearful promise to his dying mother to protect Shirahoshi and continue her work.

relationships.description: Fukaboshi's younger sister. He vows to protect her after learning of her dangerous power.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi learns about Shirahoshi's Sea King power and vows to protect her.

reveals.information: Learns that Shirahoshi is the legendary Mermaid Princess who can communicate with Sea Kings

keyMoments.title: Vows to Protect Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: After learning about Shirahoshi's power from his mother, Ryuboshi pledges to become a strong warrior to protect his sister.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ryuboshi's dedication to family and sets up his protective role.

keyMoments.title: Dances to Calm Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Remembering his mother's warning, Ryuboshi begins dancing and singing with Manboshi to prevent Shirahoshi from crying and summoning Sea Kings.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ryuboshi's immediate action to protect his sister and fulfill his vow, even as his mother dies.
keyMoments.quote: We'll always watch over our sister!

relationships.description: Ryuboshi's younger sister. He dances to prevent her from crying and summoning Sea Kings.

evolutionMoments.description: Ryuboshi learns of Shirahoshi's power and immediately acts to protect her during Otohime's death.

reveals.information: Learns that Shirahoshi can communicate with Sea Kings

keyMoments.title: Vows to Protect Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: After learning about Shirahoshi's power from his mother, Manboshi pledges to become a strong warrior to protect his sister.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Manboshi's dedication to family and sets up his protective role.

keyMoments.title: Dances to Calm Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Remembering his mother's warning, Manboshi begins dancing and singing with Ryuboshi to prevent Shirahoshi from crying and summoning Sea Kings.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Manboshi's immediate action to protect his sister and fulfill his vow, even as his mother dies.
keyMoments.quote: We'll always watch over our sister!

relationships.description: Manboshi's younger sister. He dances to prevent her from crying and summoning Sea Kings.

evolutionMoments.description: Manboshi learns of Shirahoshi's power and immediately acts to protect her during Otohime's death.

reveals.information: Learns that Shirahoshi can communicate with Sea Kings

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Learns of the Tamatebako
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX hears about the legendary Tamatebako treasure and plans to obtain it, deciding to wait for Shirahoshi to grow older.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Decken's long-term plans and the eventual use of the Tamatebako in the Big Mom storyline.

keyMoments.title: Marks Shirahoshi with Mato Mato no Mi
keyMoments.description: Taking advantage of the chaos during Otohime's assassination, Vander Decken touches Shirahoshi with his right hand, marking her with his Devil Fruit power.
keyMoments.significance: This action allows Decken to target Shirahoshi from any distance for the next ten years, leading to her imprisonment.

abilities.description: By touching a target with his hand, Vander Decken can make any object he throws with that same hand automatically chase that target.

relationships.description: Vander Decken becomes obsessed with Shirahoshi and marks her with his Devil Fruit power.

evolutionMoments.description: Vander Decken marks Shirahoshi, beginning his ten-year harassment campaign.

reveals.information: Uses Mato Mato no Mi to mark Shirahoshi as a permanent target
